content: the starfish onesie is a one-sized 0-3 month onesie featuring a star-shape and a zipper-down front overall pouch the project is designed for both ease of knitting and ease of wear - worked both in the around and flat the project requires no seaming or sewing beyond the yarn ends and zipper **sizes ** one size - 0-3 month 20-24in / 50-60cm **gauge ** 22 sts / 32 row = 4 x 4 in or 10 x 10 cm on us 7 / 4 5mm needles worked in stockinette feel free to change needle size as needed to make for a better fit **materials ** us 7 / 4 5mm needles - circular or dpns 2 9in / 23cm zippers stitch markers yarn needle preferred blocking supplies optional fabric lining for the zippers **yarn required ** 500yd / 460m worsted weight yarn baby yarn should be soft and breathable **recommended yarn ** plymouth yarn worsted merino **techniques ** long tail and backwards-loop cast on increases - kfb m1l m1r decreases - k2tog ssk ribbing find an issue in the pattern message me on ravelry knitsbybethany or instagram @knitsbybethany share your version of the starfish onesie on instagram using the hashtag #starfishonesie happy knitting
